nodes.text: Darth Vader's Activity Book is a Star Wars Legends activity book that was written by James Razzi and illustrated by Patricia Wynne. It was licensed by Black Falcon Ltd. and was first published by Random House on March 1, 1979 alongside Artoo Detoo's Activity Book, Chewbacca's Activity Book, and Luke Skywalker's Activity Book.
Join forces against the evil Darth Vader! See if you can crack his secret code, escape from his tricky mazes — and destroy the Imperial Battle Station!
Blast off for hours of Star Wars fun with these and other exciting games, puzzles, and out-of-this-world activities.
